content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Thank you for considering my apartment. Based on our discussions, I am willing to agree to a rental price of €1000 per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hello Mister Smith, thanks for coming to see the apartment. What was your thought on the rental price we discussed?
name: James Smith

content: The rental price we discussed was quite reasonable, considering the size and location of the apartment. However, I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my returns as a landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Hello Mister Smith, thanks for coming to see the apartment. What was your thought on the rental price we discussed?

I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.
name: James Smith

content: Thank you for your understanding. As a landlord, I am looking for the highest possible rental price to maximize my gains. I believe that the rental price we discussed is fair and reasonable, but I would like to negotiate further to see if we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
